Evaluate Markov model parameters

Source: R/param_eval.R
eval_parameters.Rd

Evaluate parameters specified through define_parameters, for a given number of cycles.

Usage

eval_parameters(x, cycles = 1, strategy_name = NA)

Arguments

x

an uneval_parameters object.

cycles

integer. Number of cycles to simulate.

Value

An object of class eval_parameters

(actually a data.frame with one column per parameter and one row per cycle).

Examples

param <- define_parameters(
  age_start = 60,
  age = age_start + model_time
)

heemod:::eval_parameters(param, cycles = 15)
#>    model_time markov_cycle strategy age_start age
#> 1           1            1       NA        60  61
#> 2           2            2       NA        60  62
#> 3           3            3       NA        60  63
#> 4           4            4       NA        60  64
#> 5           5            5       NA        60  65
#> 6           6            6       NA        60  66
#> 7           7            7       NA        60  67
#> 8           8            8       NA        60  68
#> 9           9            9       NA        60  69
#> 10         10           10       NA        60  70
#> 11         11           11       NA        60  71
#> 12         12           12       NA        60  72
#> 13         13           13       NA        60  73
#> 14         14           14       NA        60  74
#> 15         15           15       NA        60  75
